subject: Haptic Reactors wont work
description_text: I order the Haptic Reactors for my pedals. I dont have Simsonn pedals. I plugged in the controls box and the reactors and simhub doesnt recognizes them. When i start the software it says Simson Flasher Control Box is upgrade mode. Although i released the upgrade the mode doesnt change

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10134 中
